item.title: Reverse Engineering Tips
item.description: Data types These are more rule of thumbs patterns and need to be used looking at the surronding data. Unsigned integers 32 bits integers generally look like: 02 2F 00 00: higher bytes tend to be 00, lower tend to be used. Same thing applies to 64 bits integers. They are typilcally used to describe the following elements: counts size offsets Offsets tend to have values divided by 4 or 8 (32 or 64 bits blocks), they also tend to be 64 bits these days (size_t).
